availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander "Aleck" Craig (Jefferson County, Kentucky, wholesale merchant. )

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, wholesale merchant. Pennsylvania native. Married to Annie Eliza McCown Craig in Oldham County on February 9, 1854. Father of Mary Craig, Alexander Craig, Fannie Craig, Alice Craig, McCown Craig, and Louise Craig. Wholesale merchant in Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville/Ward 6, p. 227.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Oldham County Marriages, Film 000482442.
